requirements: Bachelor's degree of Medicine from IMED FAIMER listed university
Certificate of successfully completion of an Aesthetic Medicine Training Program from accredited institute
Training program minimum duration: 1 year full-time
Program must include theoretical and practical components
Program must conclude with passing/exit exam
Core elements: Light-based therapies, Cosmetic injectables, Skin rejuvenation, Patient Safety, Surgical Anatomy
path_1_standalone_aesthetic.experience_required: 3 years clinical experience in Aesthetic Medicine after training program

path_2_dermatology.description: Dermatology specialty with Aesthetic Medicine training
requirements: Bachelor's degree of Medicine from IMED FAIMER listed university
Certificate of completion of training in Dermatology
No additional Aesthetic Medicine training required
path_2_dermatology.experience_required: 3 years clinical experience in Aesthetic Medicine after dermatology training

path_3_plastic_surgery.description: Plastic Surgery specialty with Aesthetic Medicine training
requirements: Bachelor's degree of Medicine from IMED FAIMER listed university
Certificate of completion of training in Plastic Surgery
Additional program must include theoretical and practical components
Core elements: Light-based therapies, Cosmetic injectables, Skin rejuvenation, Patient Safety, Surgical Anatomy
path_3_plastic_surgery.experience_required: 3 years clinical experience in Aesthetic Medicine after plastic surgery training

path_4_gp_with_training.description: General Practitioner with Aesthetic Medicine training
requirements: Bachelor's degree of Medicine from IMED FAIMER listed university
Certificate of successfully completion of an Aesthetic Medicine Training Program from accredited institute
Training program minimum duration: 1 year full-time
Program must include theoretical and practical components
Program must conclude with passing/exit exam
path_4_gp_with_training.experience_required: 3 years clinical experience in Aesthetic Medicine after training program

non_resident_requirements.description: Total of 5 years clinical experience in Aesthetic Medicine, Dermatology, or Plastic Surgery after postgraduate degree (including mandatory 3 years)

scope_limitations: No surgical interventions (e.g., facelifts, liposuction, blepharoplasty)
No deep reconstructive procedures (e.g., post-burn facial reconstruction)
No invasive plastic surgery requiring general anesthesia
No systemic medical treatments outside aesthetic medicine scope

required_courses.laser_course: Certification in laser treatments and light-based therapies
